Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content:
@kpprabhu I added basic steps for chips to support docs this morning. Will update with screenshots when I get a chance, been a tiny bit busy over the last few days tho. 
Support docs are Komodo focussed in general, covering all ecosystem projects is a monumental task. It's kind of like expecting Eth to write docs for all ERC20 tokens, Or BTC to write docs for all coins that forked form their codebase.
